questions.question: Rewrite the statements in if-then form: (a) This loop will repeat exactly N times if it does not contain a stop or a go to. (b) Freeze or I’ll shoot. (c) Fix my ceiling or I won’t pay my rent.

answer.a: If this loop does not contain a stop or a go to, then it will repeat exactly N times.
answer.b: If you do not freeze, then I will shoot.
answer.c: If you do not fix my ceiling, then I won’t pay my rent.

questions.question: Suppose that p and q are statements so that p → q is false. Find the truth values of each: (a) ∼ p → q (b) p ∨ q (c) q → p
questions.answer: Given p → q is false, it follows that p = True and q = False. (a) True, (b) True, (c) True
